mapper.select: select count(nickName) from tbl_individual_member where nickName = #{nickName}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_individual_member (individual_member_name, nickname, individual_member_phone_number, individual_member_id, individual_member_password, individual_member_email, individual_member_address, individual_member_detailed_address, zip_code) values(#{individualMemberName}, #{nickName}, #{individualMemberPhoneNumber}, #{individualMemberId}, #{individualMemberPassword}, #{individualMemberEmail}, #{individualMemberAddress}, #{individualMemberDetailedAddress}, #{zip_code});
mapper.select: select i.individual_member_number, i.nickname, d.donation_amount, d.donation_products,i.number_of_donations,d.donation_date from tbl_individual_member i , tbl_donation d where i.individual_member_number = d.donation_number order by number_of_donations desc limit 0,6;

select i.individual_member_number , i.nickname , d.donation_amount , d.donation_products , i.number_of_donations , d.donation_date , (select COUNT(*) + 1 from tbl_individual_member a inner join tbl_donation b on a.individual_member_number = b.donation_number where number_of_donations > ( select number_of_donations from tbl_individual_member c inner join tbl_donation d on c.individual_member_number = d.donation_number where c.individual_member_number = #{individual_member_number} )) as my_rank from tbl_individual_member i , tbl_donation d where i.individual_member_number = d.donation_number and i.individual_member_number = #{individual_member_number};
